references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian Splatting for Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), a novel and efficient method for representing and rendering 3D scenes, which is a core component of the Wonderland pipeline.
This work introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), laying the foundation for the video diffusion models used for generating the latent space in Wonderland.

references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper presents Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), a crucial technique employed by Wonderland for high-quality image and video generation through its utilization of a latent space.

references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing Scenes as Neural Radiance Fields for View Synthesis
references.reason: This work introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), a powerful technique for representing and rendering 3D scenes that, while not directly used in Wonderland, is important for understanding the context of novel view synthesis and 3D scene representation.

references.paper_title: LRM: Large Reconstruction Model for Single Image to 3D
references.reason: This paper introduces a Large Reconstruction Model (LRM) for generating 3D representations from single images, providing a key inspiration for the design of the latent-based large reconstruction model in Wonderland.
